description: From Las Vegas to the world
ushering in a new era of wealth
intro.about: Vegas Foundation is a globally leading innovative financial institution dedicated to providing innovative financial services and asset management solutions for the global casino and gaming industry. The core goal of the foundation is to promote transparency, security, and stable profitability in the gaming industry!
intro.team: The founding team of Vegas Foundation includes globally renowned financial experts and an international professional operations team, committed to delivering high returns to partners and investors through its unique fund management system.

notice: To the Vegas Family: Before July 3rd, the foundation will reward the top 100 team leaders globally with an additional 300,000 USDT (for single-month performance exceeding 2 million within 3 generations). The reward will be airdropped directly to your earnings wallet address. A smart detection system for malicious multi-accounting is now active. The official version will launch on June 3rd, reducing daily returns to 3% and introducing a 10-generation differential reward (activated automatically with 8 direct referrals). As generational rewards are gradually unlocked each month, daily returns will decrease by one tier. Those who havenâ€™t participated yet, seize this opportunity. Wishing you happy betting! Vegas Foundation Tech Department April 15, 2025
